price: 14. Iyo reer hawdkii (loo diray Nabi Shucayb) iyo qolodii Tubbac (ee Yaman); dhammaan waxay beeniyeen Rususha, waxaana ku dhacay gooddigeyga.
arabic: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṣḥābu al-aykati waqawmu tubbaʿin kullun kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa waʿīdi
